content: You do realize how far off we are technologically and biologically to achieve something like this? The woman’s body changes as it creates and supports the fetus, including her brain, preparing her to be able to feed and develop her infant post-birth. And many women don’t consider pregnancy to be messy nor an inconvenience It’s a rite of passage, it’s an experience that builds strength and gives women entirely new perspectives. Not all people feel this way, but I think you’re completely ignoring how people actually behave and what they want out of life’s experiences. This is far too oversimplified and yes, that feels very much like it’s because you’re a man who doesn’t understand the world of wombs.
